metadata.name: Warm Glow of Night
metadata.description:
My original oil painting, "Warm Glow of Night," animated. Romance abounds as the fall colors fill the air and swirl above.

All of my NFTs are made by animating my original oil paintings. Each is a 1 of 1 ensuring a completely unique and original art piece.

Title:  Warm Glow of Night
Edition: 1 of 1
Format: 1200 x 960px, 24fps, mp4
Duration: 6 seconds on an infinite loop
Year: 2021

Email karen@karensfineart.com to receive free fine art print of the image to accompany NFT.  

Thank you so much for your interest in my art!  ~Karen
